Title: Relates to matching financing; relates to the New York state campaign finance fund and the abandoned property fund; and provides for the repeal of such provisions
Summary: Relates to matching financing; relates to the New York state campaign finance fund and the abandoned property fund.
LawCode: Amd Art 14 Head, §§14-102, 14-114 & 16-120, desig §§14-100 - 14-132 to be Art 14 Title 1, add Art 14 Title 2 §§14-200 - 14-213 & Title 1 Head, El L; add §92-t, amd §95, St Fin L; amd §658, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to statements of campaign receipts, contributions, transfers and expenditures to and by political committees; to amend the election law, in relation to establishing a contribution limit for certain contributions to a party committee or constituted committee; to amend the election law, in relation to public financing; to amend the state finance law, in relation to the New York state campaign finance fund; to amend the tax law, in relation to the New York state campaign finance fund check-off; to amend the election law, in relation to enforcement proceedings; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
